input.sentences: we finally arrived after a long drive .
the boy did some dancing on the way .
as well as some spinning on the pole .
and an artists did a caricature of us before we left .
output.sentences: The boy finally arrived at the park with his mom after a long drive.
The boy danced along the boardwalk happily.
He got to spin on the pole round and round.
He then took a break to look at the beautiful trees around him.
The boy's mom thought it would be great to end the day by getting caricature from local artists with the time they had left.
